javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
BusinessObjectTreeTable
public class JTreeTable
extends javax.swing.JTable

This example shows how to create a simple JTreeTable component, by using a JTree as a renderer (and editor) for the cells in a particular column in the JTable.

Version:
1.2 10/27/98
Author:
Philip Milne, Scott Violet
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

updateUI

public void updateUI()
Overridden to message super and forward the method to the tree. Since the tree is not actually in the component hieachy it will never receive this unless we forward it in this manner.
Overrides:
updateUI in class javax.swing.JTable

createToolTip

public javax.swing.JToolTip createToolTip()
Returns the instance of JToolTip that should be used to display the tooltip. Components typically would not override this method, but it can be used to cause different tooltips to be displayed differently.
